snippets.title: Update
snippets.description: This trigger will return the "operationType" and "updateDescription.updateFields.storeLocation" field values.

snippets.title: Delete
snippets.description: This trigger will return the "documentKey._id", "operationType", and "wallTime" field values.

snippets.title: Insert
snippets.description: This trigger will return the "baseSalary", "department", "operationType", and "documentKey.userName" field values.

snippets.title: Replace
snippets.description: This trigger will return the "operationType", "fullDocument.name", and "fullDocumentBeforeChange.name" field values.
